LanguageData.CASPowArmGloves.label: marine gloves
LanguageData.CASPowArmGloves.description: A pair of marine gloves with enhanced grip assistance and set of embedded recoil stabilisers.
LanguageData.CASPowArmGlovesArctic.label: marine gloves (Arctic)
LanguageData.CASPowArmGlovesArctic.description: A pair of marine gloves with enhanced grip assistance and set of embedded recoil stabilisers. These gloves have an arctic camo design.
LanguageData.CASPowArmGlovesDesert.label: marine gloves (Desert)
LanguageData.CASPowArmGlovesDesert.description: A pair of marine gloves with enhanced grip assistance and set of embedded recoil stabilisers. These gloves have a desert camo design.
LanguageData.CASPowArmGlovesJungle.label: marine gloves (Jungle)
LanguageData.CASPowArmGlovesJungle.description: A pair of marine gloves with enhanced grip assistance and set of embedded recoil stabilisers. These gloves have a jungle camo design.
LanguageData.CASPowArmGlovesStone.label: marine gloves (Stone)
LanguageData.CASPowArmGlovesStone.description: A pair of marine gloves with enhanced grip assistance and set of embedded recoil stabilisers. These gloves have a stone camo design.
LanguageData.CASPowArmGlovesUrban.label: marine gloves (Urban)
LanguageData.CASPowArmGlovesUrban.description: A pair of marine gloves with enhanced grip assistance and set of embedded recoil stabilisers. These gloves have an urban camo design.
LanguageData.CASPowArmGlovesWoodland.label: marine gloves (Woodland)
LanguageData.CASPowArmGlovesWoodland.description: A pair of marine gloves with enhanced grip assistance and set of embedded recoil stabilisers. These gloves have an woodland camo design.
